assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not include any research conducted by the author on animals. All the procedures performed in studies involving human participants were in accordance with the ethical standards of the Second Affiliated Hospital of Dalian Medical University and with the 1964 Helsinki Declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.
